column2: You can update or correct your Personal Information by logging in and clicking on your user name at the top of the Site to access the "Profile" section. If you no longer wish Everyday Health to use or share your Personal Information in accordance with this Policy or you no longer desire to use or access this Site, you can also remove your Personal Information from the "Profile" section of the Site. If you would like assistance disabling your account, please contact customer service at support@everydayhealth.com or call 1-888-795-4719.
